page.title: 15CLUBS
page.content: {CLUBS IN MOBBERLEY AREA. } {GIRL GUIDE CAMP. } The land was bought from Lord Egerton of Tatton during the second World War (1939-1945). It became a camp sight for Guides from South East Lancashire. It now serves Greater Manchester West from Wigan to Altrincham including Urmston and Stretford. The site covers three acres. There is a purpose built training centre where senior guides can train for their Campers Licence or which can accomodate up to 16 Brownies. Guides camp in tents or in wet weather use two huts. There is also a caravan which can be used by the site Warden during the camping season. {WOMENS INSTITUTE. } The W.I in Mobberley is well established and has many members.
